DataType

Class DataEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataType.DataEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<DataEntry>

    public abstract class DataEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<DataEntry>
    This is the base class for every data type (crisp,interval, fuzzy, intuitionistic fuzzy).

      DataEntry()

      GetMax This method returns the sup value of the caller object.
      static void Normalize(DataEntry[][] DM, java.lang.Boolean printNormalized)
      This method normalizes a whole data matrix independently of the data type of each column.
      abstract void NormalizeDataEntry(double max)
      Normalize the parameters values of the object caller by dividing the values by the parameter max.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataEntry

        public DataEntry()

    • Method Detail

      • NormalizeDataEntry

        public abstract void NormalizeDataEntry(double max)
        Normalize the parameters values of the object caller by dividing the values by the parameter max. In a MCDM problem, it would be the maximum value of a certain criterion.
        Parameters:
        max - the value to be used to normalize the parameters.

      • GetMax

        public abstract double GetMax()
        GetMax This method returns the sup value of the caller object. For example, if a triangular fuzzy set (a, b, b, c) calls the method, the method returns c. If an interval number [a,b] calls the method the method returns b. Etc...
        Returns:
        The sup value of the caller object.

      • Distance

        public abstract double Distance(DataEntry a)
        Calculates the distance between the caller object and the argument.
        Parameters:
        a - A object that the distance must be calculated from.
        Returns:
        The distance between the object that calls the method and the object in the argument.

      • compareTo

        public abstract int compareTo(DataEntry other)
        A method for comparisons between two data points that are subclasses of DataEntry.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<DataEntry>
        Parameters:
        other - The other data point to be compared.
        Returns:
        1 if the caller object is higher than the object, 0 if they are equal and -1 if the caller object is smaller.

      • Normalize

        public static void Normalize(DataEntry[][] DM,
                             java.lang.Boolean printNormalized)
        This method normalizes a whole data matrix independently of the data type of each column.
        Parameters:
        DM - The data matrix to be normalized.
        printNormalized - If true the method will print the normalized data matrix. If false, it will not.
